sources.title: Star Odyssey (1979) [Science Fiction] [Adventure]
sources.description:
"Star Odyssey" is an Italian film directed by Alfonso Brescia. The film is also known as "Space Odyssey", "Metallica" and "Captive Planet". It´s an Italian science fiction movie produced in the wake of "Star Wars" by Italian director Alfonso Brescia (under the pseudonym Al Bradley), the film takes place on Earth (now renamed "Sol 3") in the year 2312. The planet is sold to an evil despot named Kress, who soon flys to "Sol 3" to start gathering humanoid slaves to sell to his evil counterparts. Defending "Sol 3" against the new owner is the kindly Professor Maury and his ragtag band of human and robot friends. Maury and his defenders sets out to reclaim the planet from Kress and his cyborg army. Familiar faces include Gianni Garko, Malisa Longo, and Chris Avram, veterans of numerous European thrillers.

---

Directed by Alfonso Brescia, produced by Luigi Alessi , written by Alfonso Brescia
Massimo Lo Jacono and Giacomo Mazzocchi, starring Yanti Somer as Irene, Gianni Garko as Dirk Laramie, Malisa Longo as Bridget, Chris Avram as Shawn, Ennio Balbo, Roberto Dell'Acqua as Norman, Aldo Amoroso Pioso, Nino Castelnuovo, Gianfranca Dionisi, Pino Ferrara, Aldo Funari, Cesare Gelli, Claudio Undari, Filippo Perrone, Franco Ressel as Commander Barr, Massimo Righi, Silvano Tranquilli and Claudio Zucchet.

---

Source: "Star Odyssey" Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.. 4 August 2013. Web. 16 August 2013. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Last_Time_I_Saw_Paris..

If you like this movie and our channel, please subscribe: https://goo.gl/atJwQv

metadata.Plot: Earth is attacked by an intergalactic villain and his army of robotic androids.
metadata.Writer: Alfonso Brescia, Massimo Lo Jacono, Giacomo Mazzocchi
metadata.Actors: Yanti Somer, Gianni Garko, Malisa Longo
